CustomField.description: Calculates Digital Asset ARR based on either base participatory % or custom % (if set).
CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product_Type__c,'Wallet-as-a-Service')),
IF(Transaction_Fee_Rewards__c = TRUE, (Avg_Transaction_Volume__c * Avg_Transaction_Fee__c) * (Tokens_Staked__c / Avg_Total_Staked__c) * Participatory_Fee__c * 12, IF(TEXT(Node__r.Node_Family__c) = "Delegation", (Node__r.Delegation_Fee__c * Tokens_Staked__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c), IF(ISBLANK(Participatory_Fee__c), (Node__r.Participatory_Fee__c * Tokens_Staked__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c), (Participatory_Fee__c * Tokens_Staked__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c)))),
IF(Transaction_Fee_Rewards__c = TRUE, (Avg_Transaction_Volume__c * Avg_Transaction_Fee__c) * (Unique_Active_Wallet__c / Avg_Total_Staked__c) * Participatory_Fee__c * 12, IF(TEXT(Node__r.Node_Family__c) = "Delegation", (Node__r.Delegation_Fee__c * Unique_Active_Wallet__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c), IF(ISBLANK(Participatory_Fee__c), (Node__r.Participatory_Fee__c * Unique_Active_Wallet__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c), (Participatory_Fee__c * Unique_Active_Wallet__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Inflation_Rate__c * Node__r.Protocol__r.Price__c)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This will automatically populate based on the node's base participatory % or custom % (if set).
CustomField.label: ARR DA
